website_summaries.verdict: A pair of simple 2,000 mAh battery packs to replace your batteries.
pros: This pair of straightforward battery packs will increase your total playtime and are easy to use
Compatible with all Xbox One controllers, these battery packs are easy to pop in or remove and recharge in the charging station, which includes indicator lights
cons: You'll have to remove the battery packs whenever you need to charge them, and the USB cable either takes up a port on your Xbox One or requires a USB wall adapter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After a month of buying this I think it's worth it . I have no probelms with it what so ever . Longest Ive had it stay alive before charging was about a week and a half which is no problem for me at all . I usually leave it charging after 4 days just so it can be ready to use . And for those of you wondering if the back cover can be put back on . Yes it can . It does also fit the Xbox One S Controller
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Glad I searched around. These are it...
customer_reviews.text: Initial charge took about six hours, but these batteries LAST. I have been playing for about 4-5 hours and the batteries don't even show half yet. The USB from the Xbox has plenty of power to charge them. Although it is a little slower, I feel it will be better for the long term life of the batteries. Cover fits great with normal, Elite, & S controllers. Will update if anything whack happens.
customer_reviews.author: Mike5Coat

customer_reviews.title: Leaking battery
customer_reviews.text: Got these last week and one of the batteries had been leaking. Luckily the other battery works! Update: Company sent a replacement product that works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk J.

customer_reviews.title: Really like these rechargeable batteries they last so long if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like these rechargeable batteries they last so long if you have a problems with battery's that die and can't play your Xbox because you have no batteries look no further this is worth every penny most batteries would last me 5 hours that's the normal ones from the stole well these rechargeable batteries it's been 2 days now and been playing my game all day both days and have never charged it yet and it's not even said anything about low battery these are the best out there go ahead and buy you will not be disappointed thanks for making my gaming experience so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Very honest reviews!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great option for always- ready batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I've had difficulty finding a good battery solution for the Elite controller. I've tried all the main brands, including energizer for rechargeable batteries. Most rechargeables seem to die quickly or have issues charging. With this I always have a pack charging and when mine dies, I just swap them out. It's mildly inconvenient having to swap them, but it's quick enough that it really isn't a big deal. Overall these are a great option for people tired of fighting sub-par batteries and dying controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This whole kit exceeds the expectationa if my daughter and I am more than thrilled I pulled the trigger on these after a little debate. I charged both battery packs as soon as I opened the package and as stated it took exactly 7 hours to charge. This is a good thing since using a rapid charger with stress the battery packs and shorten the life span of each occuring charge. I've had the first battery pack in my Xbox One S controller for 3 days now and with heavy use the battery indicator currently reads about 75c/o full!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MovBLu

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job for the most part
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about the batteries holding charge, but the batteries do seem to act up from time to time. I use the batteries on a new and used controller and both are experiencing the same issues. They tend to disconnect and reconnect the controller randomly. Some days it'll do it 3-5 times within two hours, other days it wont repeat the issue for the whole day. But, when i replace these batteries with normal AA batteries, the issue disappears. You guys can be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldas Jablonskis

customer_reviews.title: Money saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids & I play Fortnite on the Xbox one daily. The turtle beach headphones that we use kills the batteries really quick, we’re changing batteries every other day. So I decided to look around and find a rechargeable batter pack for the remote. The reviews are kind of iffy. There’s good & some bad. But let me tell you, I am so blown away of how awesome these are! They last maybe 1-2 days of playing and since it’s a pack of two I use one and charge the other and swap them out when needed. It’s paying for itself! I would definitely recommend if you have your Xbox remote on a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Arley

customer_reviews.title: Worst Rechargeable Xbox Battery - GUARANTEED TO FAIL!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute, verified, worthless JUNK. I've attempted three different purchases from this company for various battery products; all have failed prior to 6 months. Specifically, they will NOT charge to reasonably, functionally, expected voltage values. They simply have the industries' WORST charging technology. What really ticks me off is that battery charging and rechargeable batteries are a multi-decades OLD TECHNOLOGY!! However, this company is still permitted to sell the bottom of the barrel, junk, crap on Amazon. Having purchased numerous attempts at Smatree Batteries for cameras, to game controllers to GoPro's they A-L-L F-A-I-L! I'm done. Please head my advice. You'll be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product but Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why some people are having issues. My batteries have a 30 minute long charge time and last for about 8 hours of use, so every 2-3 days I need to charge them but it's nice that it comes with 2 batteries. While I'm using one full charged battery I have the other one charging and once it's done I unplug the charging station and take the battery out. I assume people are leaving the batteries in the charging station for a whole day and it's creating heat that ruins the batteries. All around these are great, far better than any other rechargeable battery packs that I've used before.
customer_reviews.author: JKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: Initial performance was very good and I was pleased. After a couple months it started degrading quickly. I contacted Kumo world and they responded quickly and sincerely. They fully supported the product and made everything good. I couldn't have been happier with their support of the product and effort made to resolve the problem. 5 stars because of the service. If anything goes wrong, they seem eager to make it right as fast as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Timbrwolf22

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are amazing for the price, last long the only issue i have is that once the battery is drain it takes too long to charge full and the charger is very simple only have one led that shows if its full or not. Also because the battery are not lithium if you are not using them it will discharge by themselves and to keep them working properly i advise to use it until is fully discharge and recharge them completely, never use it partially discharge.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Max life 6 month if lucky, warranty don't cover bad performance.
customer_reviews.text: After purchase with in 3 months battery only lasted about 30-45 mins. It will barely hit the hour mark. Since I had 2 batteries I just kept swapping each time one died. Recently decided to contact the manufacturer for warranty coverage and they don't cover bad performance. They said after 6 month this is normal. I am quoting them below. "Thank you for your reply.We just check with our engineer.The situation about the battery is normal after using a few month later. This is a nickel-metal hydride battery, which will slowly age after you use it so many times. After 6 months of use, the capacity will decrease." Beawar before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joni J

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Xbox one controllers
customer_reviews.text: So buying batteries for Xbox controllers gets expensive. We have been using different brands of rechargeable batteries for years but we bought two of these sets for our teenage sons. It makes it easier on them to charge as you don't have to keep up with individual batteries, these are bonded together and stay together as a set. They are also easier to put in and get out of the charger than the single rechargeable batteries made by Duracell/Energizer. You just need a USB wall plug to hook the cord up to and your good to go. These have lasted us almost a year and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: jantzen

customer_reviews.title: Save Money on Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit. Comes with two battery packs, easy to charge. And fits into the Xbox controller, as it should. Nothing unexpected or surprising there. The charger itself is, well, a charger. Nothing more, nothing less. Doesn't really look tacky. You can plug it in and keep it behind your Xbox unit. When the battery pack runs out of juice, just plug them right in. I will probably pickup a few more units, so that there'll always be available batteries when one controller pack runs out. The batteries themselves feel solid. I guess only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ippolito

customer_reviews.title: Working GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Working GREAT! I needed some way to keep my Xbox one X controller up and running, I went through a set of batteries in 2 days and that was not sustainable. I have a charging stand for the Xbox 360 but was looking for something a little lighter. This works for me. There are 2 batteries so with one controller there is always one on the charger. They have the can’t over charge feature so that works. It’s been over a week and I have not had to change the batteries yet but I’m not thinking it will be a problem and I like not having to wrestle with plugging the controller in.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great value and seamless power solution
customer_reviews.text: I lived and died by the old Play & Charge kit for XBOX 360 and was disheartened that I couldn't find anything similar and affordable. Until now. So far this kit does the trick for both controllers. Setting up in a breeze as the charger runs off USB. The batteries themselves install seamlessly and have a long life, akin to rechargeable wireless Switch controller and way more than any of my PS4 controllers. It beats blowing through AA batteries every other week or so. No performance issues to note. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: @twoheadedjohn

customer_reviews.title: So much better than regular batteries
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through AA batteries like crazy in his xbox controller and I’ve been looking for a solution that doesn’t break the bank. We tried standard rechargeable AA batteries but after he accidentally threw away multiple batteries, we needed another solution. These batteries charge really fast and since it’s more like a battery pack, it’s easier to switch them out when needed. These are definitely high quality and I’m excited to be saving a bunch of money on AA batteries given he goes through a pair every week.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ross

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved these batteries and this charger. My husband wasn't chewing through all the batteries in the house with his gaming anymore, and having two distinct batteries for gaming means they didn't get lost/confused. The charger worked exactly as I thought it would. However, I had the charger and batteries for approximately three months before it melted. It was fine one day, and melted the next. There appears to be no protection against overcharging. Amazon did agree to refund me but I think the fire risk is definitely a dealkbreaker against me ordering the same thing as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Very convienent and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I switch back and forth between these with my Elite controller, using one while the other charges and vice versa. All has worked great, and they do last a very long time! Note that it isn't "smart" charging, instead it's timed. Meaning there is a pre set timer that starts when you put the pack in the charger, and it stops charging when that timer is up. So ONLY put a completely dead battery in the charger, or you risk overcharging the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kassulke

customer_reviews.title: Great packs for uninterrupted gaming
customer_reviews.text: These packs are great for keeping your game time going. Charge one while you use one. Swap and repeat. They have a pretty decent life span, as I use them with the Elite controller and wired headset all the time. charging time isn't terrible, though I have yet to actually time it. I've never had to wait on a battery pack. We have between 5-7 xbox one controllers and swapping batteries is a breeze with these packs. Definitely would purchase again/more when they finally give out (it is a battery after all).
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Best rechargeable I’ve used so far.
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a charger designed for my elite controller a while back, and it suddenly stopped working, so I ordered this one, which justifiably has the top rating on Amazon. It charges quick and lasts much longer than the previous battery packs I’ve used. It’s also much smaller than most chargers I’ve used, which is great if you’ve got limited space. The only thing you need to pay attention to is you’ll have to let them charge when they arrive before you get down to business, but that’s not enough to take a star away. Go get some fresh air!
customer_reviews.author: K. Minga

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s not bad, great idea, I don’t blow through barriers anymore so it does it’s job. It seems like the battery last a few days or maybe a week depends on how much you use your Xbox. I notice how many times I swap out the rechargeable batteries. It’s not a big deal. I remember with my Xbox 360 I hard rechargeable batteries but they would recharge if you put the controllers into the port or stand so I felt like they never needed recharging. I think I would look for a port to charge the controllers. Over not bad
customer_reviews.author: Seth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - updated
customer_reviews.text: Battery life seemed great at first - but has fallen off after a month of use. For the price, they are pretty good. Having 2 means I can always have one on the charger and swap quickly, and unfortunately that seems to be the best way to go for now. Energizer brand I've had before performed far worse. UPDATE- These last an hour now, and discharge so quickly at final stages of battery life, I don't even get a warning. Controller just dies mid gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Alexf

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if your rocking AA batteries
customer_reviews.text: I got these January 2nd and instantly threw it on the charger until my dollar general batteries died.... I love these things I got tired of stuffing AA batteries in my controller every 8 hours but these things seem to last forever I had them in by the 3rd of January and by the 6th they weren’t close to dying, so I stopped shutting my controller off when I watch tv and what not and it took it till the 16th of January for my first battery low alert... To me going from 8 hour life to half a month is just crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Stop buying Double A batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Rechargeable battery packs are the way to go. My xbox one controllers use up double a batteries so fast that I was spending 10 or more dollars per month. For $20 i was able to buy two packs that last a lot longer than a regular battery and their rechargeable. I highly recommend getting them. The usb charger cord plugs right into the side of the xbox and these battery packs fit nicely in the controller so that so can continue to use the back panel right over top.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stegenga

customer_reviews.title: Great value, holds charge
customer_reviews.text: I have had an Xbox One S for about a year now and the amount of batteries I go through is ridiculous since I play daily. I have tried other brands and the batteries either leak, barely hold charge or just do not work. After receiving this product, I gave them a good 24 hour charge to start and after that slapped one of the packs into my controller and started gaming away. I'm going to be honest, I have no idea when I put the batteries in but the bar hasn't budged an inch, which is definitely a great sign. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Hadleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good at first
customer_reviews.text: Nice little setup. I like that it has 2 batteries and a external charger. That way i can swap out batteries if need be. Changing my rating. In 5 days i will have owned these for a year. They were great for about the first 5 months, then after that i started noticing that they seemed to not be holding a charge well. Now im lucky if one battery pack make it through six hours of use. I have had the offical Microsoft packs last me well over a year and still hold a good charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Risk of overcharging and fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: No plug given. Also, a small but important point left out of the description. When charging, it will not charge over 7 hours. But if there is a power interruption or you take the batteries out, the charging time starts over. This could cause over charging. I sent this back.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: This company has paid for the product in return for my honest review. Thoughthese batteries give about 10 hours of playtime the only thing I think that could be different is the size. They don't exactly fit snug into the controller without the battery cover on. Tucson that isn't the problem but I personally like to be able to change my batteries very quickly. So I even leave the battery cover off. other than that these batteries are an excellent I would recommend them 10 times over
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this item real quick. This is a pretty self explanatory item. The batteries were uncharged when i got them, which is fine with me, safer that way. The battery packs are pretty good quality. The labeling on the battery packs are put on the wrong side so you have to insert them into the controller backwards which is kinda weird. Charges both 3000 mah batteries in 6 to 7 hours, and is supposed to have a safe charge so they dont over charge, but i wouldnt trust that. Im rating 4 because i really wish there was some form of wall mounting implementation on the rear of the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Bush

customer_reviews.title: Very Short Life Span
customer_reviews.text: Bought it once, lasted two weeks before the batteries started leaking and ruined the charger. Got a replacement. It lasted about five months, then, same exact thing. I was always careful not to overcharge them. Compared to the cost of regular batteries, replacing this product at this frequency is simply not cost effective and it requires pretty much daily charges, so there's one more thing to do in your day. Overall, this product has not proven worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Gritty Fox

customer_reviews.title: Do not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and was not damaged upon arrival. It is a Christmas gift, so I can not give review on functionality yet. Appears that it will work just fine. Update: A little over two months later, batteries work fine, but the left side of the charging dock does not work anymore. 2nd update: batteries are not functioning correctly at all. Wish I would’ve bought a different set. Always saying it’s disconnected but they are in the controller correctly. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: These Batteries do work in my Xbox controller, however the battery life is definitely shorter than using regular AA batteries. When one battery is in use the controller randomly shuts itself off and turns itself back on. Also you wont get a low battery message until the battery is a few seconds from dying. They work but I wish i spent the extra money for a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt A

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to charge, it does take 7-8 hours for each charge but they really last in my XBOX One X controller. Using regular batteries I was going through them like a hot knife in butter. These rechargeable batteries do last a long time and being able to swap them out quickly is very efficient. The little smart charger works very well too. I have had this for about a month now, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: Nice and neat
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working well. It is a little inconvenient compared to the batteries that you can charge by placing the controller in a dock, but In my experience, this battery type lasts longer. I think that having to manually change the battery is a small price to pay for being able to play longer. It's a very convenient little package and easy to set up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Eubie M. Toro

customer_reviews.title: The instructions state that it has a voltage sensor that ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions state that it has a voltage sensor that prevents overcharging, but it doesn't stop charging until the 7 hour limit is complete. If you place a full charge in your controller, and don't use any power it simply charges it for another 7 hours before preventing overcharge.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value But...
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, this item does not come with the recommended wall adapter. I had to purchase in since all my wall chargers are 4x stronger than what is recommended. For a high capacity battery back the battery life is not what I expected. Its nearly 1000MaH higher than last pack but I seem to only get maybe 5-6 hours more use out of it. The Xbox reports that the battery is never at full charge, even if you just took it off the charger. That a side, still a very decent battery back and the fact it comes with 2 packs is great.
customer_reviews.author: dj91

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt seem to work with charger, I left it ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt seem to work with charger, I left it on for over 2 days and the light never turned green to indicate a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries but...
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are amazing but they definitely don't last as long as I thought they would so do to that I believe I may have got a defective set because they only last a couple of hours. The reason why I say I think they're defective is because my friend next door has some rechargeable batteries as well and his are only 1100 mAh and they last almost a day and a half. These last six to seven hours and they are supposed to be 2000 mAh! They work though and thankfully I haven't noticed any kind of smoking or discharge so I'm happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Batteries worked and recharged perfectly for 4 months before dying all the time. I mean, 8 hours on the charger, and I’m getting 1 hour of battery life from YouTube watching with the controller off. Contacted the company for a replacement, and I was accused of not knowing how to use a rechargeable battery. They refused to acknowledge the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Roverriffer

customer_reviews.title: These are not plug and play compatible.
customer_reviews.text: I wished this was specified somewhere before I purchased these because they were not what I was looking for. I wanted a rechargeable battery pack that I could keep in my controller and just plug in the controller when the battery was low. These do not charge in the controller. You have to dock them in the charge base and then swap them out. They work fine as such, but ultimately disappointing. It's an extra piece of hardware laying around plugged in plus having to change out batteries each time they get low. I'd recommend the charge and play option over these.
customer_reviews.author: Dancin Phil

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: Best money I ever spent bought these for my 15 year old n 2018 had them over a year still work great he stopped asking for batteries from the store he uses these all the time and he can be hours in the Xbox live with friends
customer_reviews.author: Aurorasimpson2795

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: have had the product for a week now and have to say I'm still on battery #1 and still going. So far i give this a 10/10 Not only for product but the customer service who kept in touch asking how im liking the rechargeable batteries. Thank you Smatree 😎 Delivery and great customer service through the actual company. Ill add and update soon with how well the product works.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: LED function doesn’t work on the unit I was sent.. Batteries don’t charge in the charging station, the LED’s flash a very dim green continuously whether batteries are connected or not and won’t power my controller. Disappointed that this was ‘Amazons Choice’ for an Xbox One controller rechargeable battery pack. Now I have to buy batteries in the meantime while I order something else.. How about a refund plus the cost of batteries?
customer_reviews.author: Jake C.

customer_reviews.title: Best rechargable battery so far
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of my battery that held no charge in my Xbox one remotes and discharging as soon as it became unplugged from my console by accident. As soon as I got them I left them charging over night and by the time I woke up they where fully charged. They have protection to keep them from getting overcharged and damaged. These are from Smatree and holly crap they are lasting me 3-4 days of game play before I have to switch one out. I would def recommend these to anyone looking for a good remote battery replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Edward III

customer_reviews.title: Get the other ones
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 8 months Now the audio always cracks, the controller randomly turns off, but it states the battery is full in Xbox control panel. Get the other brand, 2700mh instead.. Update: KUMU immediately reached out to me after I posted this review and sent me a replacement for a possible known issue Even tho, I had already thrown everything away because of frustration. I thought that was nice of them, so I changed my review
customer_reviews.author: Juan Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but great rechargeable batteries for Xbox One controller
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and work great with my Xbox One controller. Just plug in the charging station and charge up the batteries before use. Once the green light comes on, they are fully charged and ready to go. They fit inside my controller just like normal batteries with no problems. I have not yet done a test to see how long they can go on a single charge, but they have lasted at least a week of casual gaming (an hour or two each day/every other day) without going dead. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TJ4BAMA

customer_reviews.title: Batteries were perfect the first few weeks, no charge does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I did like these for the first few weeks I used them. Now the charges in them don’t hold up as much and I have to recharge them every day I plan to play on my xbox. I can still get at most 2 hours of play before they die but it’s honestly more of a drag now to keep on changing in the middle of a game and making sure the one not in use is being charged.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: It works nicely.  I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Like loading a P90 in R6: Siege, it's that easy. When it gets low, I just pop in the other. Takes time to charge, but it'll definitely be done before the one in use gets low. I only have one negative, and even then I don't have a problem with it. You have about two minutes after you're told batteries are low to change it; otherwise, it'll just die out, and you'll have no puttering back on once more to finishing that one quick thing. It'll use it's battery from 100% to 0%.
customer_reviews.author: Another Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery set!! Works perfect for Xbox One S controllers!!
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are amazing!! Since both of my kids love to play their video games, I was on a mission to find rechargeable batteries that would fit in our Xbox One S controller and last longer than a few hours. During the summer my kids played nonstop, and these batteries still lasted about 3-4 days!!!! Now that they're in school and only play every so often, they last up to a week, even more. They do take about 6-7 hours to fully charge but since it comes in a pack of 2, you just keep one charging at all times then switch when needed. DEFINITELY recommend. Believe me, these work, as so many out there do not!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Aracena

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. After 4 charges the charger burnt a battery up. I had to throw away a new battery and charger. What is interesting is after I bought the product I received an email from the company explaining how to recover from a problem. IF THERE ARE KNOWN PROBLEMS DON’T SELL THE PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Braughton

customer_reviews.title: So much cheaper than batteries and lasts longer
customer_reviews.text: I work in the gaming industry and plat games for hours, and regular batteries die way too quick. I bought these for my xbox one controllers and they last a decent amount of time. Though I would say if you have multiple people in your house playing games often, get 2 sets because they dont charge quick enough if you're using both bettery packs all the time.
customer_reviews.author: GameOn

customer_reviews.title: The best, most compact, easiest,fastest charger out there!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I bought another that plugged into a USB port and, of course, when I needed it I had to wait to charge. This is wonderful - I have one charging while the other is being used. It's simple, quick, easy to install, compact, and fast...I love it. In fact, I'm buying a second set. ( my first came unplugged from the charger lol so.....) this way I will always have one ready to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie0464

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, reliable
customer_reviews.text: Product came in in perfect condition. Oct-23 . Review on oct.31 . Charged both battery packs over night , currently using one since I live alone. Been playing cod4 for about 4 hours since the 24th and battery is still going strong , Xbox indicator reads about 70% life remains . Definitely beats buying disposables. Hopefully nothing malfunctions with battery packs of charge port . 5star rating because for its easy use, reliability, and non bulky package.
customer_reviews.author: Jose cantor

customer_reviews.title: One side stopped working but that doesn’t bother me! Fast charging.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for a few months now and it’s still going strong... kind of. About a month in, one side stopped working. It looks like the metal part got pushed into the device somehow. However, the other side is working and that’s all I really need because my other battery is in my controller anyway so I just swap them out when it’s time. This device charges fast and the batteries last longer than other batteries I’ve had for my controller.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are pretty good. I game quite a bit and have a headset plugged in almost constantly but I only need to switch them once every other day. They come with 2 battery packs, a double charger, and a USB to micro USB charger so it's easy to just plug the battery charger directly into the Xbox instead of having to take up space in another outlet. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JustChais

customer_reviews.title: Decent battery life and harder to lose
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my Xbox 1 controllers and so far they work nicely. I previously used regular rechargeable batteries but I found that they would get used for other things in the house and never make it back in to my controllers. Because these are packaged together, they don't get used for anything outside of my controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: So far so great, but I was not able to get a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so great, but I was not able to get a full charge. I charged until the green lights came on and let it sit for another hour. After putting them in my controller, I realized it did not have a full charge. Nonetheless, these are affordable and work great so who really gives a flying crap. We should all be thankful that we can buy these without breaking the bank. I will buy more and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Collins

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was ripping through AAs after my last rechargeable stopped working. Finally got this set, and these are rad. The rechargeable packs last longer than the energizer double AAs I was using, and I always have a fresh one on the charger to replace the one I run down. The USB cord plugs right in to the USB plug on my XBOX. I'm super happy with this setup.
customer_reviews.author: ereezy503

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed.[updated 12-26-19]
customer_reviews.text: Bought this less than a year ago. Battery started to leak and got on charger. Bought a 4year warranty with it from SquareTrade. Neither the manufacturer or SquareTrade will help me get a replacement. Such bad service with manufacturer and SquareTrade. Very disappointed. [updated] Customer Service from Kumu finally contacted me via email. They actually were quick to solve any issues I had with their product. within two weeks I had a replacement product and during the two weeks Kumu stayed in contact with me via email.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Islas Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and less wasteful
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and great when you have 2 kids and one husband constantly on the xbox. Fits perfectly, no issues. I feel like they last awhile. My only issue is that I wish the cord was longer and that it would come with a cube since those are hard to come by in our house. This is actually the second one I have bought. Less wasteful than using up batteries constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley19

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as you would hope. Great batteries !
customer_reviews.text: This is 100% worth it. I can go days of not playing and then have a couple days of 4+ hour gaming. I have had this for about 3 weeks now and I have yet to have to use the second charges battery. This seem to really have some good power to them. Super easy to use and very useful! I no longer need to plug in my controller and I love that
customer_reviews.author: Bill Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: It lasts longer than regular  rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but am so glad I bought these. I was running through batteries, went to the rechargeable ones, then finally to this set. I'm happy. It lasts for months, and then when it finally does diminish, the other one is right there and ready. If you're on the fence about this, go for it. I'm glad I did. It just makes life a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Dietcokeani

customer_reviews.title: Convenient. Worth it. Never have to worry about charging my controller again.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to recharge my Xbox controller. The fact that you have 2 is the best. One can go in your controller, and when the battery is low, just swap it out with the other one! The nice thing is that while you're playing, the second one recharges. So no more fiddling with making sure to charge your controller!
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Works great last longer the standard batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Use in a Xbox one controller. I was previously using standard AA batteries and they would run out of power after a couple of days. With these rechargeable batteries I can go almost a whole week without having to swap out. Great product, I would definitely recommend these for a avid gamer!
customer_reviews.author: Jesma

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy. Money saver.
customer_reviews.text: I used to get a huge pack of AA batteries on amazon every month or so for my controllers. Especially during quarantine I was blowing through those batteries. Now I just use these and they were about the same cost. I’ll save tons in the long run. Money well spent. They work great and last a pretty long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lehmkuhl

customer_reviews.title: Held a charge for less time than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: First off, I hate disposable batteries as they seem to run out so fast and then just have to get thrown away. Therfore, these rechargeable batteries are a wonderful option for my xbox one gaming. The charger and batteries seem to be great quality and I have had no problems with them charging and working in my paddles. I was a little underwhelmed with the play-time that I get out of each charge. I just expected them to last a bit longer before needing to be re-charged. Still a good purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Brady N.

customer_reviews.title: Works for hours
customer_reviews.text: I just charged the batteries for 7 hours as described. One of the battery turned green the other one still red. I don’t know if something wrong but will try again. It’s made of high quality. X box one Edit: after charging it again, now the lights turns green back to 5 stars.. the battery holds charge for many hours. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Walid Osman

customer_reviews.title: Great product that lasts quite a while
customer_reviews.text: Great product that lasts quite a while. Charged them a week ago, average about 3-4 hours per day, and I am still using the first battery. The obvious advantage of this over the play-and-charge is you do not need to have the cable plugged in to charge the battery and have to worry about the cord getting in the way. Just swap out the depleted battery with the new one, we're talking seconds here, and continue gaming. It fits perfectly in the battery compartment and does not obstruct the cover whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe look elsewhere. While initially these seemed decent. They only hold a charge for about a day of use, not even a full day. I game maybe a couple hours a day when I do game, but I mostly use my Xbox for streaming services, and these batteries have to be changed everyday. I do not recommend these to anyone, just get the officially licensed ones from Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Doom Abuse

customer_reviews.title: The best batteries to get for Xbox controllers
customer_reviews.text: I got these back in August and I have to say I am very pleased. I have actually only charged them 2 times so far since they last so long. I don't spent hours gaming on my controllers since I only use them for driving games and flying sims. They also include a wall charger for your batteries which is super convenient as well! You won't be disappointed in these, trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and lower cost
customer_reviews.text: Extremely reliable battery life. The length of the battery life is dependent on whether you use only the controller or a headset that isn't wireless. We found that with just the controller it lasts for a few days per battery. With the headset connected to the controller though it does roughly a days worth of gaming. Really like how the charger shuts off to prevent over charging.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Really glad this comes with two batteries. I game quite a bit, plus I run a headset, so I’d say I get probably 10 hours out of every charge. Maybe a little more. For the value, though, you can’t beat it. I’ve changed them out maybe 7-8 times already so I think they’ve already paid for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very impressed. Got tired of my son burning through my Energizer Lithium AAs for his xbox and found these rechargeables on Amazon. The charger can charge both at once or one at a time. So while one is being used the other can charge. I think I am most impressed with how long these things work without needing recharged. Working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this on prime day. I've only had it for a few days. So far it's been a great battery, but they always are when you first buy them.. 600mAh more than the Microsoft product. Means it should last longer. I like that charging port, simple usb powered. Charging turns off after 7hrs, so no over-charging. Rechargeable batteries are definitely the way to go if you want to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L.

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: all I know is the price was good and my son was excited to receive them because he was going through like $30 worth of batteries a month for his controller (yes he games way too much for a 19 year old)
customer_reviews.author: dcdimattia

customer_reviews.title: No more battery buying.
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought Xbox. In today's day and age of everything having a rechagable battery in it this did not. I guess you gotta cut corners somewhere. Anyway I came on to Amazon and bought this product. Can't speak of battery life as I charged both packs (7/10/18) and am still on the first one and still shows full charge (7/14/18). I only play about an hour or three a day so this works for me.
customer_reviews.author: gregvivinpa

customer_reviews.title: So nice to be able to swap out the batteries and ...
customer_reviews.text: So nice to be able to swap out the batteries and charge one at a time. So much better than the play-and-charge where you have to plug your controller. I’ve had nothing but problems with the connections on several different controllers that make it a headache to get them plugged in just right so they’ll actually charge. If you’ve had those, or want one, just get this instead. Way better.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Batteries do not last.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries only lasted about 6 months. After that, they will not hold a charge more than 2 minutes. One of our chargers stopped working on one side after only a couple months. If you look closely, these are cheap plastic cases with regular rechargeable batteries inserted. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JMB707

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard!!!
customer_reviews.text: Put one of the battery packs in the charger last evening. An hour or so later, I smelled something metallic/or maybe a burning plastic sort of smell... traced it to this charger. The battery was too hot to touch and the plastic of the charger is melted. If this had happened a couple of hours later, my family and I would have been asleep and who knows....maybe the circuit opens and it extinguishes itself... maybe my house burns to the ground... The batteries and charger have been working flawlessly since April of this year with no indication of a problem...
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: They charge, they work.
customer_reviews.text: Can only use the charger to charge batteries. Will not charge if the controller is connected to console via USB. Have had them for a month will see how well they last.
customer_reviews.author: Grunt 117

customer_reviews.title: Charger Lights don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Charger does not indicate if a battery is dead or charged, only shows green light. Kinda annoyed by this but overall the batteries work although still it would be preferred if the product actually worked how it is supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Luque

customer_reviews.title: Good Set of Rechargable Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of using AA batteries from the 360, and I wasn't about to do the same for the One. Out of the ones I was looking at online, this is the one I went with, especially reading stories of occasional melting with the controller stands. They do take a bit to charge, but it shpuldn't be a problem if it's for just one controller. Also, while it does have the USB cable to charge, it does not have the plug for the wall. It wasn't a problem for me, but for some it might be. Overall, I'd definitely recommend these. They have good controller compatibility, and they have a decent lifespan when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go with a charge that lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have tons of rechargeable AA batteries that I used to always use, but I’m happy I have these instead. They arrived fully charged and ready to go, and they last much longer traditional batteries. I’ve had these for one and a half weeks and I still haven’t had to change the first pack I put in my controller.
customer_reviews.author: SDAllred

customer_reviews.title: great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: My son needed rechargeable batteries for his Xbox controller. We've tried the ones that you sit the controller on a recharge base but they never work well. This product is great! The battery packs are easy to charge and last a very long time. Excellent for xbox controllers!
customer_reviews.author: BirdNet9

customer_reviews.title: A really great value!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for batteries for my Xbox One controllers. I finally gave up on buying disposable batteries and took a chance on these. Well, I'm happy to report that these batteries fit the bill for exactly what I was looking for. Long lasting ✔️ Fast charging ✔️ Doesn't break the bank ✔️ Good customer service ✔️
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery Pack With Charger
customer_reviews.text: My son has had many charging stations and batteries and some how breaks them. So far this one has stood up to the test with him and he is very happy with it. They even sent me an email asking if it arrived and if it was what I expected, and yes it is. A very nice rechargeable battery, my son plays his xbox everyday before and after school for hours so far he is still using the first charge of the first battery.
customer_reviews.author: mr. raven x

customer_reviews.title: Half works
customer_reviews.text: Battery last decently when you can charge it/if it charges. One of the batteries is a dud and one of the sides on the charger does not work. Will show green but battery is dead or just doesn’t light up at all. Checked and made sure I was putting it on right. Pay the extra money and get one that isn’t cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Brodie Green

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Batteries charged up well and work great, haven't fully discharged them yet but so far they have lasted long enough to be used for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Battery Swaps
customer_reviews.text: The charging port on my Xbox Elite controller broke and I needed another solution to always having my controller plugged in. These are the next best thing. They have good life, can be swapped out in seconds, and you always have a battery available to use. Enelopes are great but the ease of a battery packs certainly trumps them.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Orolin

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of crap. Work in the controllers of my Xbox One for a week now the controllers said only turn on but do not operate the Xbox. Put in regular Duracell batteries and the controllers work fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Suhr

customer_reviews.title: Beats buying batteries!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use my Xbox that much, but I have to replace the batteries all the time. This is cheaper and easier to do. I only have one controller, but the set came with two batteries. I can use one and drain it, then skip to the spare charged battery. This is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jax

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the nyko batteries.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are INSANE! I had one in the controller for 4 days of use (roughly 12-15 hours of gaming or more) and it still wasnt dead when I plugged it in. These batteries do take a little while to charge (4-6 hours) and that would be my only con as they are so nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fox

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: They last a few days but I am a daily gamer so I tend to be on for longer periods of time. I do love that it came with two batteries so I can switch them out while the other charges. They work great, but I don’t like that they have to go in backwards for my Xbox 1 controller. Another thing is they fit a little tiny bit loosely in the controller so make sure you have the controller back.
customer_reviews.author: lindy92

customer_reviews.title: Saves ALOT of money!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my xbox controller, They take awhile to charge (few hours at times) but has decent usage depending on your play time. Light game usage I have over a week of usage. Heavy gaming lasts about 5 days. Much better than changing my batteries every few daysm saved me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product i bought one for my son coz his using my AA batteries and he doesnt like his cord plug in on the xbox bec he said he can’t moved bec the cord is too short.. so purchase this for like maybe going 3 years now and his still using them and his not complaining about the battery life.. i purchase another one for my husband and his happy about the product..
customer_reviews.author: Whenny

customer_reviews.title: Focus on the little things
customer_reviews.text: So far I've been using these batteries instead of the stock Xbox one batteries. They charge faster and seem to hold a charge longer. Only complaint is that you need to actually have a high powered microscope or eyes like an Eagle to see the tiny writing and plus minus signs on it, cause sometimes they get installed wrong (come on Smatree larger symbols would help with installation).
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Saves money and charges quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through batteries like crazy with his gaming controller. These charge quickly and are very convenient. I love that it came with 2 sets of batteries and they can all charge at the same time, that way there is always a back up ready to go. I have spent so much on batteries in the past. These will save me so much in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Battery saver pack
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have rechargeable batteries vice constantly buying. Fit perfect in the Xbox One X controller I have. Battery power is sufficient for how I play and a full recharged pack when the time comes. For the heavy duty player, 2 packs may not be enough. I have not had any issues with recharging or short use time. I took a break for a few weeks and the pack in the controller was still good to go for multiple hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: DmaninFBKS

product_meta.title: Smatree Rechargeable Battery Compatible for Xbox One /Xbox One S/Xbox One X/Xbox One Elite Wireless Controller, 2 x 2000mAh Batteries with Charger
product_meta.description:
Smatree Ni-MH Battery for Xbox one / Xbox One S Wireless Controller

Model: SM-XB1
Voltage: 2.4V
Capacity: 2000mAh(4.8Wh)


Smatree Intelligent Dual-channel Charger for Smatree SM-XB1

Model: SC-XB1
Input Require: DC 5V/1A
Output: DC 3.0V 300mAh x2

-Smatree Intelligent dual-channel charger is designed with overcharge protection, will not damage the batteries while overnight charging and keep safety.
-Can fully charge 2pcs Smatree NI-MH batteries in 6-7 hours WITHOUT interruption (DC Input >5V/1A)..
-Over-voltage protection: When the battery reaches the assigned voltage (The voltage when the battery is fully charged), charger’s indicator light will turn green and stop charging.
Overcharging time protection: The charger comes with timer, and could calculate charging time automatically to make sure charging time within 7 hours. When charging time exceeds 7 hours, charger’s indicator light will turn green (stop charging) to protect batteries from overcharge. ( If the charge is interrupted, the charging time will be re-calculated ).

LED Indicator Light:

Red indicator light: Charging
Green indicator light: Fully charged / Standby

Package: 

2x Smatree battery for Xbox One
1x Smatree Dual-channel Charger
1x USB Cable
feature_bullets: Rechargeable xbox one battery: say goodbye to AA battery, 2000mAH high capacity rechargeable battery for Xbox One / Xbox One S / Xbox One X / Xbox One Elite controller charger
Dual-Channel Charger Charges 2 Batteries to 100% in about 6-7 hours with no interruption when DC Input >5V/1A

Controller charger with interlligent timer, effectively calculate charging time.when charging time exceeds 7 hours,charger’s indicator light will turn green.If you interrupte charging time , the charging time will be re-calculated
Longer battery life: 2-packs rechargeable NI-MH xbox one batteries for longer playing time
With over charge protection, charge the batteries overnight with safety. We supply one year warranty for xbox one battery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,622 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
